channel.title: imputation on mlr3 gallery
channel.description: Recent content in imputation on mlr3 gallery

item.title: Impute missing variables
item.description: Prerequisites This tutorial assumes familiarity with the basics of mlr3pipelines. Consult the mlr3book if some aspects are not fully understandable. It deals with the problem of missing data. The random forest implementation in the package ranger unfortunately does not support missing values. Therefore it is required to impute missing features before passing the data to the learner. We show how to use mlr3pipelines to augment the ranger learner with automatic imputation.
